name: Doi Sorshe Ilish
extraInfo: This recipe goes best with hot rice.

ingredients.name: Mustard (Sorshe)
ingredients.quantity: 3 teaspoons - ground to a fine paste

ingredients.name: Green Chillies (Kacha Lanka)
ingredients.quantity: 12 nos. - ground to a fine paste

steps: Wash and cut the Hilsa fish into small pieces.
Take a pressure cooker and place the Hilsa fish pieces in it  along with the mustard paste, chillie paste, curd, mustard oil,  turmeric and some water.
Place the cooker on maximum heat.
When the full cooking pressure is reached, reduce the flame  and cook for 3 to 4 minutes.
Open the cooker lid immediately after releasing the steam pressure.
Your DOI SORSHE ILISH is ready to be served.
